talentList.name: Improved Wrath
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Nature's Grasp
talentList.description: While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 35% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 1).  Only useable outdoors.  1 charge.  Lasts 45 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Nature's Grasp
talentList.description: Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Entangling Roots
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots.

talentList.name: Improved Moonfire
talentList.description: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Natural Weapons
talentList.description: Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by v0%.

talentList.name: Natural Shapeshifter
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Thorns
talentList.description: Increases damage caused by your Thorns spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Omen of Clarity
talentList.description: Imbues the Druid with natural energy.  Each of the Druid's melee attacks has a chance of causing the caster to enter a Clearcasting state.  The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next damage or healing spell or offensive ability by 100%.  Lasts 10 min.

talentList.name: Nature's Reach
talentList.description: Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Vengeance
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Starfire
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of Starfire by v0 sec and has a v1% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talentList.name: Nature's Grace
talentList.description: All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 0.5 sec.

talentList.name: Moonglow
talentList.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Moon Fury
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Moonkin Form
talentList.description: Transforms the Druid into Moonkin Form.  While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 360% and all party members within 30 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 3%. The Moonkin can only cast Balance spells while shapeshifted. The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

talentList.name: Ferocity
talentList.description: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by v0 Rage or Energy.

talentList.name: Feral Aggression
talentList.description: Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by v0% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by v1%.

talentList.name: Feral Instinct
talentList.description: Increases threat caused in Bear and Dire Bear Form by v0% and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.
details: Requires Cat Form, Bear Form, Dire Bear Form

talentList.name: Brutal Impact
talentList.description: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Thick Hide
talentList.description: Increases your Armor contribution from items by v0%.

talentList.name: Feline Swiftness
talentList.description: Increases your movement speed by 15% while outdoors in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge while in Cat Form by 2%.

talentList.name: Feral Charge
talentList.description: Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec.
details: Requires Bear Form, Dire Bear Form

talentList.name: Sharpened Claws
talentList.description: Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by 2%.

talentList.name: Improved Shred
talentList.description: 1Reduces the Energy cost of your Shred ability by v0.

talentList.name: Predatory Strikes
talentList.description: Increases your melee attack power in Cat, Bear and Dire Bear Forms by v0% of your level.

talentList.name: Blood Frenzy
talentList.description: 1Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a v0% chance to add an additional combo point.

talentList.name: Primal Fury
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form.

talentList.name: Savage Fury
talentList.description: Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Faerie Fire (Feral)
talentList.description: Decrease the armor of the target by 175 for 40 sec. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.
details: Requires Cat Form, Bear Form, Dire Bear Form

talentList.name: Heart of the Wild
talentList.description: Increases your Intellect by v0%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by v0% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by v0%.

talentList.name: Leader of the Pack
talentList.description: While in Cat, Bear or Dire Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party members within 45 yards by 3%.

talentList.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
talentList.description: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Furor
talentList.description: Gives you v0% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.

talentList.name: Improved Healing Touch
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Nature's Focus
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting the Healing Touch, Regrowth and Tranquility spells.

talentList.name: Improved Enrage
talentList.description: The Enrage ability now instantly generates v0 Rage.

talentList.name: Reflection
talentList.description: Allows v0% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

talentList.name: Insect Swarm
talentList.description: The enemy target is swarmed by insects, decreasing their chance to hit by 2% and causing 66 Nature damage over 12 sec.

talentList.name: Subtlety
talentList.description: Reduces the threat generated by your Healing spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Tranquil Spirit
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Rejuvenation
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Nature's Swiftness
talentList.description: When activated, your next Nature spell becomes an instant cast spell.

talentList.name: Gift of Nature
talentList.description: Increases the effect of all healing spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Tranquility
talentList.description: Reduces threat caused by Tranquility by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Regrowth
talentList.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Swiftmend
talentList.description: Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.
